title: App Lab
intro: App Lab is a cross disciplinary group of academics, researchers, students, designers and developers exploring new ways of learning through technology and new media. The App Lab creates pedagogical transformation through instructional design, user meaning-making and emerging learning technologies, applied into experimental app design & development. Their goal is to produce the best possible learning outcomes for all learners in meaningful ways.

title: VR Lab
intro: AUT XR lab is situated in the AUT School of Art & Design and conducts collaborative research projects with partners in science, health, and heritage, including social impact, climate change/sustainability, and science/health communication. The labâ€™s expertise lies in 3D visualisation, and interactive experience and narrative design for a range of Virtual Reality applications.
